Bloomsbury Publishing PLC , a British publishing house, appointed Penny Scott-Bayfield as chief financial officer, effective July 16, 2018. Ms. Scott-Bayfield succeeds Wendy Pallot who will step down from her role on July 18, 2018. Ms. Scott-Bayfield is currently finance director at Conde Nast Inc.â€™s U.K. business. Prior to joining Conde Nast, she held senior finance roles at Sky PLC and Lastminute.com PLC. Compensation details were not immediately available.
Debenhams PLC , a British department-store operator, said its current CFO Matt Smith will leave the group to take up the role of finance director at competitor Selfridges & Co. Debenhams has commenced the search for a successor. Mr. Smith has been Debenhams CFO since Jan. 2015.
